text: Teuma geutamong u dalam kuta Dum ureueng jaga pih hana leumah Geu-eu dua droe ureueng meupake Awak Israi geukalon siblah Sidroe treuk teuma awak Peuraʻeun Musoh phon jameun Peuraʻeun jadah Israi teuma jilakee bantu Geujak treuk laju Musa tueng balah Ban tanjo geupoh awak Peuraʻeun Mate jih sinan laju ka reubah Geukheun le Musa teuma ‘oh heueh nyan Buet lon nyoe chetan bak lon jijak s‘ah Keubit sit chetan musoh raya that Lon jipeusisat nyata that leupah
